title: ICE unresolved lifetime (in associated type)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: A-associated-items
labels.description: Area: Associated items such as associated types and consts.

body:
Code:

```
#![feature(associated_types)]
trait A<'a> {
    type Q: Iterator<&'a int>;
}
fn main () {}
```

Error:

```
<anon>:3:23: 3:25 error: internal compiler error: unresolved lifetime
<anon>:3     type Q: Iterator<&'a int>;
```

Backtrace:
